name: The Legend of Sarah
description:
The Legend of Sarah is a short adventure game that draws heavy inspiration from the Oracles titles in the Legend of Zelda series. Set forth on an epic quest! Fight monsters! Solve puzzles! Collect treasures!

Note: A compatability patch will be forthcoming to make the game render correctly and improve the on-screen buttons for mobile browsers. At the time of publishing, I did not realize the game would run on mobile at all.  Sorry for the inconvenience~

Controls ButtonActionArrow Keys
MoveZInteract / Main Item
XOffhand ItemShiftOpen/Close Inventory

This game was created during a two-week period for #LOWREZJAM 2020. The Legend of Sarah will be available to play in-browser or as a download starting at 7:00PM EDT on August 16th.
